Question.Subject: I need some advice...?
Question.Content:
I asked this question before but for some reason it got deleted. So I recently created a blog and I was just wondering what other people thought of it. I'm new to this whole blogging world so I was just wondering if there was anything I can do to make my blog better. Be honest, I really want to know what you think. Also, any good suggestions to get some more followers would be great. http://surlabrightside.blogspot.com
Thank you for your time, Brooklynn
Question.ChosenAnswer: My question was deleted and Yahoo Answer's team never explained to me why they did it and I could't find a reason in their contract. I think they are not listening to the people who use this site. This is indicative of poor management.

Answer.Content: My question was deleted and Yahoo Answer's team never explained to me why they did it and I could't find a reason in their contract. I think they are not listening to the people who use this site. This is indicative of poor management.
